participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is introspective and often feels weighed down by her thoughts. She is compassionate, but struggles with self-esteem.
participant_1.background: i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working. i work at a nursing home. i do not believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy.
